Core:Properties.Core:Property: "0010 rem - DESCRIBE SUB-ROUTINE, CALLED BY AUTO:START\\n0020 rem - SET DEFAULT SEX PROPERTIES\\n0030 if \$prop(this.trait:sex) = nil then\\n set this.trait:sex to this.theatre:gender\\n0040 rem - GREY ARE ALWAYS NEUTER ::\\n if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = grey then\\n set this.trait:sex to neuter ::\\n goto 0080\\n0050 rem - VLHURGH ARE ALWAYS NEUTER ::\\n if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = vlhurgh then\\n set this.trait:sex to neuter ::\\n goto 0080\\n0060 rem - NEEBIL ARE ALWAYS NEUTER ::\\n if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = neebil then\\n set this.trait:sex to neuter ::\\n goto 0080\\n0070 rem - MUST NOT BE NEUTER ::\\n if \$prop(this.trait:sex) = neuter then\\n set this.trait.sex to male ::\\n goto 0080\\n0080 rem - SET BASE:GENDER\\n0090 if \$prop(this.trait:sex) = male then\\n set this.base:male to 1\\n0100 if \$prop(this.trait:sex) = female then\\n set this.base:female to 1\\n0110 if \$prop(this.trait:sex) = neuter then\\n set this.base:neuter to 1\\n0120 rem -- SET TRAIT:SEX AND TRAIT:SEXNAME\\n0130 if \$prop(this.base:male) = 1 then\\n goto 0160\\n0140 if \$prop(this.base:female) = 1 then\\n goto 0170\\n0150 if \$prop(this.base:neuter) = 1 then\\n goto 0180\\n0160 rem - SET MALE NAMES AND ADJECTIVES ::\\n set this.base:male to true ::\\n set this.trait:sex to male ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-adj adjective=\"female\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-name name=\"female\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<add-adj adjective=\"male\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<add-name name=\"male\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n goto 0190\\n0170 rem - SET FEMALE NAMES AND ADJECTIVES ::\\n set this.base:female to true ::\\n set this.trait:sex to female ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-adj adjective=\"male\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-name name=\"male\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<add-adj adjective=\"female\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<add-name name=\"female\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n goto 0190\\n0180 rem - SET NEUTER NAMES AND ADJECTIVES ::\\n set this.base:neuter to true ::\\n set this.trait:sex to neuter ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-adj adjective=\"male\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-name name=\"male\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-adj adjective=\"female\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-name name=\"female\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>) ::\\n goto 0190\\n0190 rem - SET TRAIT:VARIANT\\n0200 if \$prop(this.trait:variant) = nil then\\n set this.trait:variant to ordinary\\n0210 if \$prop(this.trait:old:variant) = nil then\\n set this.trait:old:variant to ordinary\\n0220 set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-adj adjective=\"\$this.trait:old:variant\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>)\\n0230 set this.trait:old:variant to \$prop(this.trait:variant) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<add-adj adjective=\"\$this.trait:variant\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>)\\n0240 rem - SET TRAIT:color\\n0250 rem\\n0260 if \$prop(this.trait:color) = nil then\\n set this.trait:color to generic\\n0270 if \$prop(this.trait:old:color) = nil then\\n set this.trait:old:color to generic\\n0280 set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-adj adjective=\"\$this.trait:old:color\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>)\\n0290 set this.trait:old:color to \$prop(this.trait:color) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<add-adj adjective=\"\$this.trait:color\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>)\\n0300 rem - SET CHARACTER NAME\\n0310 set this.skotos:playercapname to \$capitalize(\$substr(\$prop(this.skotos:creator),0,5))\\n0320 set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<add-name name=\"\$this.skotos:playercapname\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>)\\n0330 rem\\n0340 rem\\n0350 rem\\n0360 rem - SET TRAIT:ALIENTYPE\\n0370 if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = nil then\\n set this.trait:alientype to alien\\n0380 if \$prop(this.trait:old:alientype) = nil then\\n set this.trait:old:alientype to alien\\n0390 set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<rem-name name=\"\$this.trait:old:alientype\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>)\\n0400 set this.trait:old:alientype to \$prop(this.trait:alientype) ::\\n set this.ztemp to \$sam(\<add-name name=\"\$this.trait:alientype\" obj=\"\$this\" detail=\"default\"/\>)\\n0410 if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = grey then\\n set this.base:urparent to \$lookup(Hegemony:Aliens:UrGrey)\\n0420 if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = grune then\\n set this.base:urparent to \$lookup(Hegemony:Aliens:UrGrune)\\n0430 if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = iyali then\\n set this.base:urparent to \$lookup(Hegemony:Aliens:UrIyali)\\n0440 if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = neebil then\\n set this.base:urparent to \$lookup(Hegemony:Aliens:UrNeebil)\\n0450 if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = sorvu then\\n set this.base:urparent to \$lookup(Hegemony:Aliens:UrSorvu)\\n0460 if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = thrile then\\n set this.base:urparent to \$lookup(Hegemony:Aliens:UrThrile)\\n0470 if \$prop(this.trait:alientype) = vlhurgh then\\n set this.base:urparent to \$lookup(Hegemony:Aliens:UrVlhurgh)\\n0480 rem - CLEAR ANY TEMPORARY PROPERTIES\\n0490 set this.ztemp to nil\\n"
